rows.label: qst1003105_msg001
rows.name:
I heard you helped out at all
three distribution centers.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg002
rows.name: You were a real help. Thank you.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg003
rows.name:
The people and soldiers who already had
little to spare are now taking it out on
the refugees. It's a sad state of affairs.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg004
rows.name:
Perhaps living with no leeway has
impoverished their hearts as well.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg005
rows.name:
They didn't have the luxury
of caring for others...
and neither did we.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg006
rows.name:
But thanks to you, we're starting
to get that leeway back.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg007
rows.name:
I hope this will improve
everyone's lives.

rows.label: qst1003105_msg008
rows.name:
You were a great help
this time. Thank you.
